title: Anyone knows this old script typeface?
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112642im_/http:/typophile.com/files/poznaj-nas-intro-03_6100.jpg)

Can anyone help to identify this typeface?
author: Tomek Peszor

comments.content: May be [Indenture English Penman](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015112642/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/intellecta/indenture-english-penman/) using some swashes and stylistic alternates.
Looks like this was an easy one :) Thanks Ryuk!
